Kevin Munc

Drafts for Mac is coming!

16 Aug 2018

Oh man. I’ve been hoping for this.

For many years, I’ve been using a Mardown+Dropbox-based system for daily notes, particularly for business-related journaling (I guess you could call it that).

Notational Velocity, nvAlt, and more recently The Archive have been my workhorses on macOS, with 1Writer and other Dropbox-enabled apps on the iOS side. It has been a great system.

I imagine I’d use Drafts for iOS more than I do if it were not for this.

I’ve obviously used various client apps over time, so iCloud sync vs Dropbox is probably the key factor for me to consider once this is released. (Unless Drafts adopts Dropbox support as part of the move to Mac, of course — though I’d be surprised if it did.)
